hebrewNER.hmm
Class HmmNameFinder

java.lang.Object
  hebrewNER.hmm.HmmNameFinder
public class HmmNameFinder
extends java.lang.Object

The Hmm name finder tags token using the statistical model read from a file.
The search for the best tag sequence is done by Viterbi search.

tag

public java.lang.String[] tag(java.lang.String[] toks,
                              Sentence posAnal)
tag a sentence using a Viterbi search on the HMM.

Parameters:
toks - the array of sentence tokens
posAnal - the part of speech analysis
Returns:
The array of corresponding named entity tags

viterbi

public int[] viterbi(java.lang.String[] context,
                     Sentence posAnal)
Preforms a Viterbi search on a sentence using its conetext an pos analysis

Parameters:
context - the array of context for the sentece tokens
posAnal - the part of speech analysis
Returns:
The array ints representing the nodes of the best sequence
